about_the_game:
The world, transformed by a cataclysmic event, is seeing new forms of life emerge in the midst of humans. And among them, divines have appeared to guide the survivors to the only continent left on earth. 

You take on the role of one of these divines, with the aim of leading your people to the continent, while trying to convince, or eliminate, the people who stand in your way.

Expand your village 

  • Manage your village, build houses and many other buildings to keep your villagers happy and prosperous. 

  • Assign them roles and professions within the village to ensure it runs smoothly. 

  • Expand your influence to extend your reach and impress neighbouring villages.

Use your divine powers for good ... or evil  

  •  Use over 20 spells to protect, destroy or manipulate your villagers or those of your divine opponents.

  • Be careful, all your actions will have an impact on your town, its visual style, the style of your villagers and their behaviour, and may open up new ways of playing.

Follow the lives of your villagers

  • Your villagers have a life of couples, families and work, and take time out to relax. Meet their needs to keep them as happy as possible (in their own way) and earn rewards for expanding and decorating your village.

  • Customise your villagers with over 1,200 combinations of clothes, hairstyles, tattoos and more...

Play with and against your friends

  • In addition to the single-player campaign mode & classic single-player games, you can play in co-op with your friends, or against them to establish yourself as the ultimate divine being.

name: Two Sides : Voyage to the Mainland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD 500 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Two Sides: Voyage to the Mainland is a management game where you play as a divine being who guides his people using his incredible powers. Will they be cute, overly benevolent people, or a people who live from day to day with no respect for anything?
